El T-34 es un tanque mediano de fabricación soviética que fue producido entre 1940 y 1958.

El desarrollo del T-34 partió de la serie de tanques rápidos BT, y Christie M1928 con blindaje inclinado, con la intención de reemplazar al BT y al tanque de infantería T-26. Tras el poco éxito de los tanques soviéticos en la Guerra Civil Española, la falta de blindaje se hizo notable.

El T-34 era el tanque que mejor equilibraba potencia de fuego, movilidad y blindaje de los existentes, aunque inicialmente su eficacia en el campo de batalla fue malograda debido a la mala disposición ergonómica del compartimiento de la tripulación, la carencia de radios, la falta de municiones y el empleo de tácticas pobres, así como una anticuada cadena de mando.

A finales de 1943 se introdujo el mejorado T-34/85, con un cañón de mayor potencia.

El diseño y construcción del tanque fueron continuamente refinados durante la guerra para mejorar su eficacia y reducir los costes, permitiendo que se dispusiera de un número de tanques cada vez mayor.

Hacia 1945, el versátil y rentable T-34 había sustituido a la mayoría de los tanques pesados y ligeros en servicio.

Fue una influencia en el desarrollo posterior del nuevo concepto de tanque, el tanque de combate principal.

Para realizar su llamado, la rana infla sus pulmones, luego el aire es expulsado de los pulmones rápidamente a través de la laringe y el saco vocal. Las vibraciones de la laringe emiten un sonido que resuena en el saco vocal. La resonancia hace que el sonido se amplifique, y permite a la llamada a llegar más lejos.

Generators are easily repaired when grouped and with the maps being so big all you have to do as a survivor is stay one one other person and the game is ez. Don't waste your time on this game unless you just have nothing better todo with your time.

Игра хорошая, но есть свои минусы. 1 довольно много багов. 2 хитбоксы, топорик может пролететь в метре от вас, но всёравно попасть. Ну вообщем купить можно.

Бля ребят ну чё сказать. Это пиздец господа. Большинство проблем разработчики убирают, но есть те которые не исправляют уже долгое время, Например: Ебучие окна (После того когда перепрыгнешь через окна ман может пробить через него на расстоянии 3 м, и кста бывает это частенько ну лично у меня). Ебучие топоры Ани, такое ощущение как будто ты играешь за персонажа который в 3-е больше Джейн Ромеро И ростом  Шакило Онила. Я не знаю это проблемы с хитбоксами или с чем то это ещё, но раздражает что пиздец. А так если есть с кем играть то можно

(i have more hours on different platforms btw)
In dbd, you need really good wifi playing as survivor for the game favours what the killer sees. This means that if on your screen you didn't get hit, but on the killers screen you did, you get hit.
The looping element of the game as survivor is the most fun part of the game and after a lot of experience you can obviously see your own improvement, There are also a few perks you can use to get into chases quicker and others that can prolong chases or make them easier. For example, laurie strodes perk 'object of absession', allows you and the killer to see were eachother are, this means the killer will most likely go straight to you when the game starts. Also you can use david kings 'dead hard' wich allows you to essentially take another hit. You can also use the 2 non teachable perks resilience and spine chill as a combo, knownas 'vault speed build' beacuse you are able to do things 9% faster when injured with resilience and do things 9% faster when the killer is looking at you with spine chill. Put the 2 together and you can vault 18% faster during chases.

Over all, this is my favourite game and has been for a while since I've been playing it a long time before I built my pc about a month ago. It can feel stale at times but there is always a new survivor or killer to level up and prestige. or a few new challenges to do. And with the endless possibilities of perk loadouts that can alter the way you play to maximise the use of the perks, you are never bored for long.

Honestly, fuck this game and the developers. I used to love and defend it despite the flaws because there was passion, but with the new Binding of Kin chapter BHVR has shown their greed. The game is a buggy mess, the dlc is unfinished but they expect you to buy it and the cosmetics. The mods on the discord banned a youtuber for criticising the new update (and many more now) because they went against the status quo.

 As for the game itself? It's repetitive, poorly balanced, insanely grindy and as said before, bug ridden. The meta never really shifts because that is too much work I guess, and if you think the developers listen to any of their community you're wrong. 

The developers purely care about data and stats, but won't show it when asked by said community so everyone is left scratching their heads. As if all of that wasn't enough, the team bends the knee and panders to vocal minorities for jokes and caters to demands to get social brownie points. They listen to people who complain over meaningless trash more than player feedback.

Look, I really mean it when I said I used to love this game. It has some great designs and characters, the lore is even kind of interesting. Problem is the game isn't in a good state, and at this rate I don't see it getting better unless people make a fuss and stand up to BHVR's nonsense. There's tons of smaller more specific things to be critical and angry over, but typing on mobile is a pain. Look around and you'll see more of the problems plagueing the game. This new chapter alone the community found 89 bugs, many game breaking on multiple characters and the QnA today did nothing to quell the community's concerns. That alone should worry anyone who wants a game to get the love it needs, and deserves.

this game is amazing when you are just starting or are getting good games but the're lots of problems like people face camping and getting kills with no punishment for doing so as well as killers like doctor making it impossible to use pallets/windows due to his ability to make people scream (which has no cool down) and teammates hiding instead of helping with once again no punishment as they can still find hatch all in all they need to listen the community more instead of making it easy for bad players to get away with camping hiding and spamming i would recommend it if you just want a fun game to play with friends i would recommend customs

I have more than 1k hours in Dbd and I love this game. It has many downsides but on the other hand also many upsides. Its very fun to play with friends and sometimes even alone. Though there are some annoying things in this game such as that you wont really understand what to do within you first 100 hours of playing this game. Dbd is all about experience and consistency. So dont give up on yourself too quick. It takes time to fully understand the game. 

I still love the game and its definetly my favorite game at the moment.

2016年，杀机beta测试第三天，我在斗鱼上看到一个主播在砍人。我确实有点兴奋。
“而如今我的眼前只有黑暗。”

[杀机的背景故事太烂了，我没有任何的分析欲望。制作组的叙事在游戏的发展中不断跑偏。事到如今，停留在表面就好。而公测版本的杀机才是这个游戏本来的样子。当然，那样不好玩。]
新背景故事中，充满了心理创伤与超自然感知的联系。这有什么意义呢？只是让黑雾中的神袛变得无趣。恶灵在从前，只要四季镇和屠夫老家来人就抓走，现在却得费劲“诱拐”。换言之，痛苦应是祂带来的结果而非吸引祂的原因。还是说祂换口味了，喜欢吃PTSD味的希望？

地图平衡性和定值献祭时间是这个游戏的两个缺陷。杀机中逃生者的地图上限普遍高于杀手，导致屠夫普遍击杀效率低；而不合时宜的守尸却把对击倒/修理军备竞赛变成了无趣的挂机/打150QTE（现在是300了蛤）竞赛，这两者综合起来显著削弱了游戏性。
